Reviews.Title: Very good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: A. Ellis
Reviews.Content: personally I would not pay extra for 1080p on any TV below 42 inches because there isn't a difference as far as i'm concerned, so I went for this TV, and I am very happy I did.  It has a good picture quality, and although the sound isn't great I don't care because I use external speakers when it matters.  My only complaint is that the menus are very very slow, especially changing inputs.  however, this is just a minor annoyance.
